markdown: (for office use) THE AMERICAN SOCIETY FOR CLINICAL INVESTIGATION <::attestation: Signature Signature: legible Readable Text: C. Kirk Osterland Description: Handwritten signature next to "NAME OF CANDIDATE" label.::> HAS ACADEMIC RANK OF CANDIDATE CHANGED? option YES: [ ] option NO: [x] HAS ADDRESS OF CANDIDATE CHANGED? option YES: [ ] option NO: [x] INDICATE CHANGES: ADDITIONAL BIBLIOGRAPHY 1) Todd, C.W., Walz, M.A. and Osterland, C.K. Evidence for a common antigen specificity on heavy chains from human IgG, IgM and IgA. Proc. Soc. Exp. Biol. & Med. 126:383, 1967 2) Eisen, H.M., Little, J.R., Osterland, C.K. and Simms, E.S. A myeloma protein with anti- body activity. Cold Spring Harbor Symposium of Quantitative Biology 32:75, 1967. 3) Muller-Eberhard, H.J. and Osterland, C.K. Zone electrophoresis on powder blocks. Methods in Immunology and Immunochemistry. Ed. M. W. Chase & C. A. Williams, pp 57-67, 104-107, 1968. 4) Davie, J.M., Osterland, C.K., Miller, E.J. and Krause, R.M. Immune cryoglobulins in rabbit streptococcal antiserum. J. Immunol. 100:314, 1968. 5) Coleman, R.W., Osterland, C.K., Dorfman, R.F. and Chaplin, H. Jr. A unique lymphopro- liferative disorder associated with IgM platelet agglutinins, diffuse hypergammaglobu- linemia, amyloid deposition and excess urinary excretion of IgG fragments. Am. J. Med. (in press). 6) Davie, J.M. and Osterland, C.K. Chemical characterization of glycopeptides from human M globulins. J. Exp. Med. 110:699, 1968. 7) Osterland, C.K. and Krause, R.M. Immune response in rabbits to streptococcal group- specific carbohydrate. Proc. of International Society of Microbiology, p 120, 1968. 8) Lindqvist, K.J., Coleman, R.W. and Osterland, C.K. Autoantibodies in chronic tuberculosis (submitted). 9) Osterland, C.K. and Davie, J.M. Studies on the carbohydrate of macroglobulins. Proc. of the XII Congress of the International Society of Hematology, 1968 (in preparation). ABSTRACT - Now published (#4 above) 5) The immune cryoglobulins in rabbit streptococcal antiserum. Fed. Proc. 26 (2):530, 1967. J. Immunology 100:314, 1968. (J.M. Davie, C.K. Osterland, R.M. Krause) Kobel Thank --- SIGNATURE Submit a complete list of candidates publications to date. Use the following order: authors (in the order in which they appear in the original publication), title, journal, volume (underlined), page, and year. Abstracts should be clearly identified if included listed separate from-ed in the bibliography. If more space is needed request additional sheets or submit seven copies on standard paper. 12 PLEASE DO NOT FOLD Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/mhvd0227
